resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105718</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105718</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085867</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Observing other teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten anderer Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observer d'autres professeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observando outros professores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservazione degli altri insegnanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση άλλων δασκάλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación de otros profesores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learning from other teachers is an important means of professional development. Here are some suggestions for observing successful teachers in your school, in other schools, and on the web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Lernen von anderen Lehrern ist wichtige Mittel
der professionellen Entwicklung. Sind hier einige Vorschläge 
für das Beobachten der erfolgreichen Lehrer in Ihrer Schule, in 
anderen Schulen und auf dem Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étude d'autres professeurs est des moyens 
importants du développement professionnel. Voici quelques 
suggestions pour observer les professeurs réussis à votre école, 
dans d'autres écoles, et sur le Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprender de outros professores é meios 
importantes do desenvolvimento profissional. Estão aqui algumas
sugestões para observar professores bem sucedidos em sua escola, em 
outras escolas, e no Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparando da altri insegnanti è mezzi importanti 
di sviluppo professionale. Qui sono alcuni suggerimenti per 
l'osservazione degli insegnanti riusciti a vostra scuola, in altre 
scuole e sul Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εκμάθηση από άλλους δασκάλους είναι ένας 
σημαντικός τρόπος της επαγγελματικής ανάπτυξης. Εδώ είναι 
μερικές προτάσεις για τους επιτυχείς δασκάλους στο σχολείο σας, 
σε άλλα σχολεία, και στον Ιστό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El aprender de otros profesores es los medios 
importantes del desarrollo profesional. Aquí están algunas 
sugerencias para observar a profesores acertados en su escuela, en 
otras escuelas, y en el Web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085867</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105718</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/observing-other-teachers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
